_sText:
This is simple map I made, inspired by I favorite old ZE maps, Boat/Island/Artic and its nice and boxy, anyways hope it's fun.

-b2-
Fixed Bobsled glitch at path peak

-b3-
Fixed some minor errors
Increased boat speeds
Planks on first 3 bridges can be destroyed
Added section between river and escape area
(Lake with docks, cave island, icebergs and mini armory)
Added 1 more secert

-b4-
Added 2 teleports with multiple entrances to help behind players
Increased Tram leave time
Decreased Bobsled leave time
Bobsled ramp doesn't shoot players off 
Breakable ice walls at cave exit
Added Frozen section after cave, stops first boats
(2 docks with 2 boats at the end of the middle, 3 houses)
Destroyable bridge moved to across river
Healing house added before Lake
Lake bridge box and railing added
Armory doors breakable
Added 1 more secret, made others harder   

-b5-
Waterfall bridge added(some how I deleted it x.x)
Removed 1 dock leading to second pair of boats and added a ice path to 3 houses
1 more destroyable bridge added back at old location
Moved Healing house to other side of lake entrance

-b6-
Round time extened to 8mins
Teleport times extended
First washtub leave time now 5secs
Gap between final island bridges smaller
Added 2 more secert, redid old ones
